headlines.description: Killian Tillie scored 22 points and No. 6 Gonzaga raced away to its sixth straight West Coast Conference title with a 74-54 victory over BYU on Tuesday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: No. 6 Gonzaga beats BYU 74-54 for sixth straight WCC title

video.headline: Tillie stays hot from behind the arc for Gonzaga

notes.headline: WEST COAST CONFERENCE MEN'S TOURNAMENT - FINAL

headlines.description: Ky Bowman had 26 points, 10 rebounds and six assists to lead Boston College over Georgia Tech 87-77 on Tuesday in the opening game of the Atlantic Coast Conference Tournament.
headlines.shortLinkText: Bowman leads BC past Ga Tech 87-77 in ACC tourney opener

notes.headline: NEW YORK LIFE ACC MEN'S TOURNAMENT - 1ST ROUND

headlines.description: Bonzie Colson scored 19 points in 33 minutes, getting a full day's work in his third game back from injury as Notre Dame needed the star forward to hold off Pittsburgh 67-64 in its Atlantic Coast Conference Tournament opener Tuesday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Colson, Notre Dame hold off Pitt 67-64 in ACC Tournament

notes.headline: NEW YORK LIFE ACC MEN'S TOURNAMENT - 1ST ROUND

headlines.description: Marlon Stewart scored a career-high 29 points with four 3-pointers, Geno Crandall added 18 points and defending Big Sky Tournament champion North Dakota rallied to beat Montana State 76-74 on Tuesday in the first round.
headlines.shortLinkText: North Dakota rallies by Montana State in Big Sky's 1st round

headlines.description: Elijah Mayes had 27 points and six assists to lead Florida A&M to an 88-78 victory over Howard on Tuesday in the first round of the Mid-Eastern Athletic Conference Tournament.
headlines.shortLinkText: Florida A&M beats Howard 88-78 in MEAC first round

headlines.description: Jordan Davis scored 21 points to lead four in double-figure scoring as Northern Colorado rolled to an 82-59 victory over Northern Arizona on Tuesday in the first round of the Big Sky Conference Tournament.
headlines.shortLinkText: N. Colorado beats N. Arizona 82-59 in Big Sky tourney

headlines.description: Reginald Gardner Jr. scored 20 points and his four 3-pointers sparked key second-half runs that powered sixth-seeded North Carolina Central past No. 11 seed Coppin State 60-48 in Tuesday night's opening round of the Mid-Eastern Athletic Conference...
headlines.shortLinkText: NC Central downs Coppin St. 60-48, advances to MEAC semis

headlines.description: Freshman forward Marek Dolezaj scored a career-high 20 points and Syracuse won an Atlantic Coast Conference Tournament game for the first time, beating Wake Forest 73-64 on Tuesday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Syracuse tops Wake Forest 73-64 for 1st ACC tourney win

video.headline: Syracuse's Chukwu slams home alley-oop in crunch time

notes.headline: NEW YORK LIFE ACC MEN'S TOURNAMENT - 1ST ROUND

headlines.description: Grant Benzinger had 19 points and nine rebounds to help second-seeded Wright State beat eighth-seeded Cleveland State 74-57 on Tuesday night to win the Horizon League Tournament title and earn an NCAA Tournament bid.
headlines.shortLinkText: Wright State tops Cleveland St 74-57, earns NCAA Tourney bid

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCB Highlight (Wright State outperforms Cleveland State) 2018/03/06 ESHEET

notes.headline: LITTLE CAESARS HORIZON LEAGUE MEN'S CHAMPIONSHIP - FINAL

headlines.description: Joe Chealey had 32 points and the College of Charleston rallied from 17 points down in the second half to win the Colonial Athletic Association Tournament championship and earn its first NCAA Tournament berth in 19 years with an 83-76 overtime win...
headlines.shortLinkText: Charleston rallies to NCAAs with 83-76 OT win over Huskies

video.headline: Charleston holds on to win nail biter

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCB Highlight (Charleston holds on to win nail biter) 2018/03/06 ESHEET

headlines.description: Drew Urquhart scored 19 points and grabbed eight rebounds and top-seeded Vermont beat fifth-seeded Stony Brook 70-51 in Tuesday night's America East Conference Tournament semifinal to advance to its third straight conference final.
headlines.shortLinkText: Vermont heads to finals with 70-51 win over Stony Brook

headlines.description: Joel Hernandez had 32 points and seven rebounds, and LIU Brooklyn shocked New York City rival Wagner 71-61 on Tuesday night to win the Northeast Conference Tournament title and earn its first NCAA Tournament bid in five years.
headlines.shortLinkText: LIU Brooklyn shocks NYC rival Wagner to win NEC title

video.headline: LIU takes down Wagner for NEC championship

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCB Highlight (LIU takes down Wagner for NEC championship) 2018/03/06 ESHEET

headlines.description: K.J. Maura scored 18 points with three 3-pointers and five assists, Arkel Lamar added 13 points with eight rebounds, and No. 2 seed UMBC beat third-seeded Hartford 75-60 in Tuesday night's America East Conference Tournament semifinal.
headlines.shortLinkText: UMBC downs Hartford 75-60, faces Vermont in finals

headlines.description: Martaveous McKnight and Quamauri Hardy scored 16 points apiece, Steen Trent added 11, and top-seeded Arkansas-Pine Bluff beat Mississippi Valley State 77-73 in Tuesday night's Southwestern Athletic Conference quarterfinal.
headlines.shortLinkText: Pine Bluff beats Mississippi Valley, heads to SWAC quarters

headlines.description: Eddie Reese scored 21 points and the game-winning free throw with one second left and Southern rallied to beat Jackson State 62-60 in a Southwestern Athletic Conference Tournament quarterfinal on Tuesday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Reese's free throw wins it, Southern heads to SWAC semis

headlines.description: Brandon Better scored 18 points, Dwayne Morgan had 11 points and 10 rebounds and Southern Utah beat Idaho State 76-68 on Tuesday night in the first round of the Big Sky Conference Tournament.
headlines.shortLinkText: Southern Utah beats Idaho State 76-68 in Big Sky Tournament

headlines.description: David Jenkins scored 29 points, Mike Daum had 25 points and 11 rebounds, and South Dakota State beat South Dakota 97-87 on Tuesday night to win the Summit League Tournament championship, clinching the Jackrabbits a third straight NCAA Tournament berth.
headlines.shortLinkText: Jenkins, Daum lift Jackrabbits back to NCAA tourney

video.headline: South Dakota St. edges out South Dakota for Summit title

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCB Highlight (South Dakota-South Dakota State) 2018/03/06 ESHEET

headlines.description: Phillip Carr scored 21 points, Tyler Streeter added 14, including a go-ahead 3-pointer late, and Morgan State nearly blew a 17-point lead but held off South Carolina State 83-80 in a Mid-Eastern Athletic Conference Tournament opener on Tuesday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Morgan State holds off SC State 83-80 to advance in MEAC

headlines.description: Donte Clark scored 30 points, Marquis Salmon had 13 points and 13 rebounds and Texas Southern rolled to a 90-76 victory over Alabama State on Tuesday night in a Southwestern Athletic Conference Tournament quarterfinal.
headlines.shortLinkText: Texas Southern beats Alabama St. 90-76 in SWAC quarterfinal

headlines.description: Gary Blackston scored 21 points, JD Wallace had 16 points and 11 rebounds and Prairie View A&M beat Alcorn State 87-71 on Tuesday night in a Southwestern Conference quarterfinal.
headlines.shortLinkText: Prairie View A&M beats Alcorn St. 87-71 in SWAC quarterfinal

nowFeed.headline: Theo Pinson is having himself a day. 17 points, 10 rebounds and two assists (which seems low, to be honest). Hit a 3-pointer a couple minutes ago.

nowFeed.headline: Joel Berry headed to the locker room. Looked like he landed awkwardly.

nowFeed.headline: Wow, Jevon Carter swishes a running shot from half-court before the halftime buzzer, giving West Virginia a little breathing room over Baylor going into the locker room.
nowFeed.story: Wow, Jevon Carter swishes a running shot from half-court before the halftime buzzer, giving West Virginia a little breathing room over Baylor going into the locker room.

nowFeed.headline: Seton Hall leads Butler 43-35 at halftime of the last Big East tourney quarterfinal. Pirates shot 65.4 percent from the field, including 7-for-9 from beyond the arc. Ismael Sanogo with a team-high 12 points off the bench. Kamar Baldwin has 14 for Butler.
nowFeed.story: Seton Hall leads Butler 43-35 at halftime of the last Big East tourney quarterfinal. Pirates shot 65.4 percent from the field, including 7-for-9 from beyond the arc. Ismael Sanogo with a team-high 12 points off the bench. Kamar Baldwin has 14 for Butler.

nowFeed.headline: North Carolina takes a one-point lead into halftime after Lonnie Walker fouled Cam Johnson shooting a desperation 50-footer at the buzzer. Weird game so far. UNC couldn't do anything early, Miami got bogged down when it's ball-screen-only offense didn't work.

nowFeed.headline: Texas freshman Mo Bamba, after his return Thursday in a four-point loss Texas Tech, said he's pleased with how the Longhorns are playing as they head into the next round of the postseason. And Bamba is not surprised by the offensive outburst from guard Jacob Young.

nowFeed.headline: Marquette star guard Markus Howard said he felt his shoulder pop, which caused him to leave the game and head to the locker room late in the second half. He said it's pretty sore, and he'll do whatever the trainers tell him to do.
nowFeed.story: Marquette star guard Markus Howard said he felt his shoulder pop, which caused him to leave the game and head to the locker room late in the second half. He said it's pretty sore, and he'll do whatever the trainers tell him to do.

nowFeed.headline: Marquette coach Steve Wojciechowski: "I believe we're an NCAA tournament team. But that's not something I can decide on."
nowFeed.story: Marquette coach Steve Wojciechowski: "I believe we're an NCAA tournament team. But that's not something I can decide on."

nowFeed.headline: Mike Krzyzewski on Notre Dame: "I hope they can get in because I think they can beat anybody. Mike [Brey] has that team together all year, forget it."
nowFeed.story: Mike Krzyzewski on Notre Dame: "I hope they can get in because I think they can beat anybody. Mike [Brey] has that team together all year, forget it."

nowFeed.headline: Jay Wright said he thought his Villanova team wore down Marquette, who had to play last night. "I'm really excited that we're starting to get better defensively," Wright said.
nowFeed.story: Jay Wright said he thought his Villanova team wore down Marquette, who had to play last night. "I'm really excited that we're starting to get better defensively," Wright said.

nowFeed.headline:
Middle Tennessee's three best wins: Murray State, Western Kentucky, Old Dominion.

Two Quadrant 3 losses, one Quadrant 4 loss.
nowFeed.story:
Middle Tennessee's three best wins: Murray State, Western Kentucky, Old Dominion.

Two Quadrant 3 losses, one Quadrant 4 loss.

nowFeed.headline: Second-seeded Texas Tech staved off a Texas comeback bid, turning away the Longhorns 73-69 in the third game Thursday at the Big 12 tournament. The Longhorns cut a 14-point disadvantage to one in the second half behind a career-high 29 points off the bench from Jacob Young -- the highest-single game total by a Texas player this year -- but Tech got 25 from Keenan Evans to win its second straight after four consecutive losses. The Red Raiders will play West Virginia or Baylor in a Friday night semifinal.
nowFeed.story: Second-seeded Texas Tech staved off a Texas comeback bid, turning away the Longhorns 73-69 in the third game Thursday at the Big 12 tournament. The Longhorns cut a 14-point disadvantage to one in the second half behind a career-high 29 points off the bench from Jacob Young -- the highest-single game total by a Texas player this year -- but Tech got 25 from Keenan Evans to win its second straight after four consecutive losses. The Red Raiders will play West Virginia or Baylor in a Friday night semifinal.

nowFeed.headline: Villanova cruises to a 94-70 victory over Marquette, advancing to the Big East tourney semis. Wildcats shot 11-for-17 from beyond the arc in the second half. Mikal Bridges and Jalen Brunson had 25 and 21 points, respectively. Marquette will have a very nervous wait until Selection Sunday.
nowFeed.story: Villanova cruises to a 94-70 victory over Marquette, advancing to the Big East tourney semis. Wildcats shot 11-for-17 from beyond the arc in the second half. Mikal Bridges and Jalen Brunson had 25 and 21 points, respectively. Marquette will have a very nervous wait until Selection Sunday.

nowFeed.headline: And now, 70 hours of "Will Notre Dame get a bid?" As a whole, the Fighting Irish's resume is borderline: RPI in the 60s, 2-9 against Quadrant 1, 7-11 against Quads 1 + 2, three Quadrant 3 losses. Predictive metrics like them. How much will the Bonzie factor matter?

Had hit that mark five times in his first 24 games this season.

nowFeed.headline: Marvin Bagley was grabbing his finger after his last basket. Trainer looked at it on the sideline, looks like he taped up a finger on Bagley‘s right hand, but Bagley returning to the game.
nowFeed.story: Marvin Bagley was grabbing his finger after his last basket. Trainer looked at it on the sideline, looks like he taped up a finger on Bagley‘s right hand, but Bagley returning to the game.

nowFeed.headline: Marvin Bagley just dominates with his energy and athleticism. 16 points and 10 rebounds in the first 24 minutes here today — most of it coming from simply playing harder than everyone else. Like to see that in your best player.
nowFeed.story: Marvin Bagley just dominates with his energy and athleticism. 16 points and 10 rebounds in the first 24 minutes here today — most of it coming from simply playing harder than everyone else. Like to see that in your best player.

nowFeed.headline: Texas freshman Mo Bamba nailed a 3 at the first-half buzzer to bring the Longhorns to within 35-28 of Texas Tech, as close as Texas has been since first three minutes of this Big 12 tournament game. Bamba, in his first action since Feb. 24, finished the opening half with seven points and four rebounds in seven minutes.
nowFeed.story: Texas freshman Mo Bamba nailed a 3 at the first-half buzzer to bring the Longhorns to within 35-28 of Texas Tech, as close as Texas has been since first three minutes of this Big 12 tournament game. Bamba, in his first action since Feb. 24, finished the opening half with seven points and four rebounds in seven minutes.

nowFeed.headline: Villanova leads Marquette 41-34 at halftime of Big East tourney quarterfinal No. 3 at MSG. It hasn't been easy — Markus Howard and Andrew Rowsey have 16 and 14 points respectively, including seven treys. Mikal Bridges has 16 for Nova.

nowFeed.headline:
Duke up four at the half. 

Notre Dame's perimeter trio of Matt Farrell, TJ Gibbs and Rex Pflueger had a combined 13 points on 3-for-11 shooting from 3-point range. Irish getting open shots against the Duke zone; they're just not falling.
